pageTitle: Skada Damage Meter : Data Mods : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (3) * Fixed Failbot detailed views. * Fixed pet cache bug leaking memory. * Added option to show/hide minimap button. r6: * Fixed a bug where bars would not be cleaned up in-between fights, causing leftover bars to remain. * Added /skada reset command. * Fully translateable. r17: * Translations fixed; got error from the ones not loaded previously. * Fixed damage spell details; don't show resists, absorbs etc for now. Maybe split view at some point. * Added a simple /skada report function. r22: * Added zhCN translation, courtesy of wowui.cn. r23: * Fixed a nasty memory leak. r29: * DPS measurement improved; should now be accurate for the "Total" segment. * Added a DPS mode. * Added a window lock option. r37: * Reporting improved; can now do /skada report [say|guild|party|raid] [number]. * Fight segments are now stored persistently and will not disappear after a relog/reloadui. * Added option for choosing condensed or detailed number format. * Added automatic/asked data reset options. * Added
